name: VEP-18 Occipital Lobe
desc: The All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG increases by 20%. When Ultimate is used, for every hit enemy target, the All-Type RES PEN for the next Ultimate's DMG will additionally increase by 3%.
enhanced_desc: The All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG increases by 25%. For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG additionally increases by 3%.
